song_name: Organ Symphony No 3 Op 78 - If I Had Words
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Organ Symphony No 3 Op 78 - If I Had Words has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody and below-average scores in Chord Complexity and Chord-Melody Tension.
key_conclusion:
Organ Symphony No 3 Op 78 - If I Had Words is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music.
